data.title: About Turner & Sons Roofing & Siding, LLC Middletown CT Doors
data.meta_description: Learn more about Turner & Sons Roofing & Siding, LLC. Free siding estimate. Contact us in Middletown, CT, or call for windows.
data.text:
In 1956, Donald Turner Sr. set out to create a company that operated on the principles of beauty, quality, and responsibility. Three generations later, those principles are still the driving forces behind Turner & Sons Roofing & Siding, LLC.

With more than 60 years of proven results, our company has gained a reputation for integrity and trust with families wanting high standards of construction, professionalism, and honesty. Developing personal partnerships with our clients has helped define us as northern Middlesex County’s premier exterior house remodeling contractor.

John Hayden Turner (Donald’s son) ran the John H. Turner Roofing Company until 2006, when his son, Doug Turner, joined the company. The name was then changed to Turner & Sons Roofing & Siding LLC. In 2013, the daily management and operations of the company were assumed by Doug Turner as the managing member. Hayden Turner resides as an active member and salesman.

Put your confidence in a company that has decades of experience turning houses into homes! Our contractors use careful planning and precision in their craftsmanship to keep projects on schedule and looking great. Trust the family company that has a reputation for providing superior results that will last into future generations.

Trusted Exterior House Remodeling Services

Your house should be a place that you’re proud to come home to. If it’s not, then you need to invest in it and ensure that it works for you and your family. Turner & Sons Roofing & Siding, LLC can help! Get the home that you have always dreamed of with our expert restoration and upgrade services.

Residential roofing

Siding

Windows

Doors

Gutters

Our experienced crew will meet your budget and timeline – every time. Learn more about us!

Schedule a FREE Estimate

A house remodeling project isn’t easy. That’s why you need a quality partner to ensure that the work goes smoothly and that your vision becomes a reality. Turner & Sons Roofing & Siding, LLC has the experience and dedication that is required. Get a FREE estimate today by calling (860) 346-7405, or you can fill out our online form.
